name: Bear to Beer
description:
What would you do if your delicious jug of beer was taken from you? You would go after it of course! However, the path is not easy! Venture through deep forests, encounter dangerous traps and foes that make the journey to the beer dangerous.

In Bear to Beer, you help the bear reach the beer that he lost. Race through the forest maze, find your way through as quickly as you can but avoid the obstacles!

Use the WASD keys to make your way trough the maze. 

Team 3:
Programming - Robin de Paepe
Audio Design - Kimberly Terburg, Wim Wenskus
Game Design - Wim Wenskus
3D Art - Omar Al-rubaye
Production - Kimberly Terburg
